name: Block Chains
description:
Hey There! Welcome to my page!

Block Chains is a game about chaining blocks together to get a high score or to clear the field of blocks completely. This game is a twist on the usual matching game formula and a way to test out my new game engine with which I made this game.

The source code is available along with the download as well as the art and music. Feel free to use anything in this project as you please, it is all made by me and public domain.

Finally, I hope you have fun, or at the very least find something useful in the source or assets.
